Key Match Events: India won the match by 6 wickets (with 1 ball remaining)
New Zealand's Finn Allen gave them a quick start
Indian bowlers Washington Sundar and Kuldeep Yadav bowling economic spells
Pre-Game Insights: Pressure on India as New Zealand look to seal the series in Lucknow
India's top order will be in focus with Prithvi Shaw waiting in the wings
New Zealand will be backing Glenn Phillips to come good in the second T20I
Miscellaneous Highlights: All five T20Is hosted by the Ekana Stadium to date have been won by the side batting first
India's previous T20I in Lucknow was in February 2022
Others: India (probable): 1 Shubman Gill, 2 Ishan Kishan (wk), 3 Rahul Tripathi, 4 Suryakumar Yadav, 5 Hardik Pandya (capt), 6 Deepak Hooda, 7 Washington Sundar, 8 Shivam Mavi, 9 Kuldeep Yadav, 10 Umran Malik, 11 Arshdeep Singh

New Zealand (probable): 1 Finn Allen, 2 Devon Conway (wk), 3 Mark Chapman, 4 Glenn Phillips, 5 Daryl Mitchell, 6 Michael Bracewell, 7 Mitchell Santner (capt), 8 Ish Sodhi, 9 Lockie Ferguson, 10 Jacob Duffy, 11 Blair Tickner
